title: No reconnect game bug?
body:
My game randomly got stuck in attempting to reconnect. Nothing wrong with my internet or connection. After waiting for i while i decided to exit and restart. But now when I log in it acts as if there is no live game nad it lets me queue up for other games, despite op.gg tracking the live game is still going...

Is this a bug or something? I'd hate to get demoted/banned because of this?

replies.body: It sounds like your connection is struggling to get to the game server, which can happen even if your internet is super good, and resulted in a remake.  Stick to a custom for now and use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
